messages.subject: Re: Caution Ebay Users!
messages.msgSnippet: ... that ebay doesn t even have my yahoo email address! This is a fraud! It looks exactly like an ebay page. So if you use ebay and receive this message, check
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Rose" <rosejansen@y...>
wrote:
> I just received an email message on my yahoo account saying that I
> needed to update my ebay bank account information. The problem is
that ebay doesn't even have my yahoo email address! This is a fraud! It
looks exactly like an ebay page. So if you use ebay and receive this
message, check with the real ebay before you do anything!>>>>>>

This has happened to me a few times (I have more than one email address
and I DO have an ebay account). Forward it to spoof@.... Also,
look at the address they sent it to - it wasn't even mine, so they have
ways of messing with you. Annoying.
Jann

messages.subject: Caution Ebay Users!
messages.msgSnippet: I just received an email message on my yahoo account saying that I needed to update my ebay bank account information. The problem is that ebay doesn t even
messages.messageBody:
I just received an email message on my yahoo account saying that I
needed to update my ebay bank account information. The problem is that
ebay doesn't even have my yahoo email address! This is a fraud! It
looks exactly like an ebay page. So if you use ebay and receive this
message, check with the real ebay before you do anything!

Rose Jansen
